timeline.bodyText: Maybe I'm missing something here, but doesn't this actually break for HadoopCatalog without the default set of keys (it'll drop through and be rejected in the else block)?
timeline.author: danielcweeks

replies.bodyText: Yes, that is the expected behavior if you create a namespace with metadata properties in the Hadoop catalog because there is nowhere to store them.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.message: Make SparkCatalogTestBase abstract to avoid running it as a suite.
